CustomField.description: Merges the following to be used as the email subject for Quotes sent via DocuSign: 'Citron Hygiene Documents for your DocuSign Signature - ACCOUNT ACCPAC OR QUOTE NUMBER - ACCOUNT NAME - QUOTE NAME'
CustomField.formula: LEFT('Citron Hygiene Documents for your DocuSign Signature - ' + IF( ISBLANK(Opportunity.Account.AccPac_Account__c), QuoteNumber, Opportunity.Account.AccPac_Account__c) + " - " + Opportunity.Account.Name + " - " + Name, 100)
CustomField.label: DocuSign Subject
